{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Forbes |model=E-Waste Hotspot |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=useless junk |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350;RT5350F; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350;RT5350F; |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags=3G,battery |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Microsoft_Office365 |default_ssid_regex=^Microsoft_Office365$ |default_ip=192.168.100.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} The name of this entry is tentative.
[http://slickdeals.net/f/5983512-Forbes-with-built-in-wifi-hotspot?p=59023140 On '''Slickdeals'''] :The (presumed 3G, over '''T-Mobile''') hotspot will remain active for up to 15 days after activation. :The battery is specified to last for 2-3 hours of continuous use. :The default SSID would seem to be '''Microsoft_Office365''' w/ a default WPA key of '''Office365'''. <!-- if wrong, correct this please! --> :Per forum users, the device uses RT5350. [http://www.reddit.com/r/wifi/comments/1cwhwu/magazine_with_free_wifi_inside/ '''Reddit''' post on ''/r/wifi''] :WiSoC module + unknown 3G USB dongle ("021AJW4C13053767" on the Data Matrix label) :[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gmpHbQEzDjg '''YouTube''' video of the device] ::'''Ralink''' RT5350F SoC ::'''EtronTech''' EM63A165TS (32MB) RAM <!-- seriously? -->
